trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.DateValidationError?displayProperty=fullName> event occurs when <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is set to a value that cannot be interpreted as a date or when the date cannot be selected.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.DateValidationError?displayProperty=fullName>就會發生事件時<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName>設為無法解譯為日期，或當無法選取的日期值。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.DateValidationError?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can subscribe to this event and specify whether an exception is raised by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePickerDateValidationErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以訂閱此事件，並指定是否引發例外狀況是藉由設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePickerDateValidationErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePickerDateValidationErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePickerDateValidationErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is `true`, one of the following exceptions is raised: |Exception type|Condition| |--------------------|---------------| |<xref:System.FormatException>|The text entered cannot be parsed to a valid date, and the exception is not suppressed.| |<xref:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException>|The text entered parses to a date that is not selectable.| If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePickerDateValidationErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is `false`, the application continues execution as usual.
trans-unit.target: 如果是<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePickerDateValidationErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName>`true`，引發下列例外狀況的其中一個: |例外狀況類型 |條件 | |--------------------|---------------| |<xref:System.FormatException>|輸入的文字無法剖析為有效的日期，且不會隱藏例外狀況。 | |<xref:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException>|輸入的文字會剖析為不是可選取的日期。 | 如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePickerDateValidationErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName>是`false`，應用程式會如往常般繼續執行。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePickerDateValidationErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException> </xref:System.FormatException> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePickerDateValidationErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DatePickerDateValidationErrorEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DatePickerDateValidationErrorEventArgs"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The initial exception from the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.DateValidationError"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 從初始的例外狀況<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.DateValidationError"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: The text that caused the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.DateValidationError"></xref> event.
Gets the initial exception associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.DateValidationError"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 取得相關聯的初始例外狀況<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.DateValidationError"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: The exception associated with the validation failure.
trans-unit.target: 驗證失敗相關聯的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text that caused the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.DateValidationError"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定造成之文字<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.DateValidationError"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: The text that caused the validation failure.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePickerDateValidationErrorEventArgs.Exception*> should be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePickerDateValidationErrorEventArgs.Exception*>應該擲回。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePickerDateValidationErrorEventArgs.Exception*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the exception should be thrown; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果應該擲回例外狀況。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
